# JSON Schema validators

### JSV
* source: https://github.com/garycourt/JSV
* version: v4.0.2
* draft support: 3
* __NOTES__: custom build with jsv.js, schema03, URI.js, URN.js appended, adapted to browser usage.

### z-schema
* source: https://github.com/zaggino/z-schema
* version: v5.0.2
* draft support: 4
